programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: A woman hires a vicious killer to murder her fiancee.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: Slade is transporting an embezzler when train robbers release his prisoner.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: An outlaw forces Roy to track down his missing horse.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Dale helps a falsely accused man escape from jail.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Doc Stevens' traveling store has a more sinister purpose.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The local postmaster plots to rob a train carrying a valuable bank shipment.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: A man is falsely imprisoned on a murder charge, then escapes to join an outlaw gang and unmask the real killer.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: The story of Sila and Firman, two child jockeys living in the impoverished island of Sumbawa, where horse racing with young children is a long-established tradition. The stakes are high, but it's the riders who pay the price.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: The Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: A cowboy (John Wayne) protects a girl (Sheila Terry) and her father (George Hayes) from a rustler and a sheriff.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is asked to search for missing people in Canada, and quickly finds out a gang of French Canadian outlaws have been kidnapping people.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: Ted and Dusty infiltrate a band of outlaws to get close to Mr. Gentry, the man who murdered Ted's father.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Marshal John Carruthers helps a sheriff find out who stole the town's payroll, and together they discover the town's leader stole the money to buy up all the land.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (John Wayne) and his friend Jake (George Hayes) have to keep two crooks away from their gold.

programme.title: The Man From Utah
programme.desc: A tough cowboy has a head-to-head confrontation with a gang of outlaws using a rodeo as its base of operations.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: A cowboy (John Wayne) romances a pretty woman (Marion Burns) while tracking the outlaw gang that killed his father.

programme.title: The Desert Trail
programme.desc: A rodeo rider (John Wayne) and his assistant (Eddy Chandler) are accused of robbing and murdering a promoter and must assume new identities to track down and bring the real killers to justice.

programme.title: Paradise Canyon
programme.desc: A federal agent tracks down a gang of counterfeiters operating along the Mexican border.

programme.title: Rainbow Valley
programme.desc: A federal agent poses as a prisoner in order to secure vital secrets from a fellow inmate concerning an outlaw gang.

programme.title: Texas Terror
programme.desc: A former lawman straps on his six-shooters when he discovers the identity of his best friend's killer.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: Two former Pony Express riders enter a dilapidated stagecoach in a race for a government mail contract.

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: A rancher (John Mack Brown) makes his cousin (John Wayne) trail boss on a cattle drive headed for trouble.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: An outlaw (John Wayne), a prostitute (Claire Trevor), a drunken doctor and assorted others go through Indian country.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) tries to tame his wife (Maureen O'Hara) amid a feud with settlers and trouble with Indians.
